definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
poor monk (humble term used by monk of himself)
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
to mock/to be ridiculed/to incur ridicule through one's poor performance (humble)
to become visible/to appear/to manifest one's true nature
to fool the world and usurp a good name (idiom)
I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)
to take one's seat according to the ticket number/(fig.) to put (things or people) in their right place/to take a general comment as a personal attack
